feed.title: Mercercrest Bridge Club Blog
feed.subtitle: A blog for the Mercercrest Bridge Club, mostly for results postings.

entry.title: November 25, 2025 Results
entry.content:
Thanks for coming to tonight’s game. Remember there is not a game next week - see everyone in two weeks! Happy Thanksgiving, and good luck to all the San Francisco competitors.

Our winners tonight were Cornel and Dave. Flight B and C winners were John and Chris.

Full results are available at https://mercerislandbridge.github.io/2025/251125E.htm

Common game results are available at https://thecommongame.com/NiteResults/20251125Rank.html
entry.summary: Thanks for coming to tonight’s game. Remember there is not a game next week - see everyone in two weeks! Happy Thanksgiving, and good luck to all the San Francisco competitors.

entry.title: November 18, 2025 Results
entry.content:
Thanks for coming to tonight’s game. Our winners tonight were Bogdan and Aaron, Dong and Genie in Flight B, and Nick and Leyi in Flight C.

Remember that we will be open next week, and closed the week after. Then we will have our holiday party and team game the week after that.

Full results are available at https://mercerislandbridge.github.io/2025/251118E.htm

Common game results are available at https://thecommongame.com/NiteResults/20251118Rank.html
entry.summary: Thanks for coming to tonight’s game. Our winners tonight were Bogdan and Aaron, Dong and Genie in Flight B, and Nick and Leyi in Flight C.

entry.title: November 11, 2025 Results
entry.content:
Thanks for coming to tonight’s game - it was great to see so many players tonight. If you enjoy playing evening bridge please also come out to the Thursday night game at 13 Top Tricks!

Next week will be our quarterly club championship. We will be closed on December 2, and we will have a Holiday Party and Swiss Teams on December 16.

Our winners tonight were Stan and Cornel, closely followed by Kim and Eric. The Dong’s won the other direction with the Kasperkiewicz’s in second and winning Flight C.

Full results are available at https://mercerislandbridge.github.io/2025/251111E.htm

Common game results are available at https://thecommongame.com/NiteResults/20251111Rank.html
entry.summary: Thanks for coming to tonight’s game - it was great to see so many players tonight. If you enjoy playing evening bridge please also come out to the Thursday night game at 13 Top Tricks!

entry.title: October 21, 2025 Results
entry.content:
Thanks for coming to tonight’s game. Our winners tonight were Kim and Jeff. Winners the other direction were Cornel and Dave S. Flight b winners were the Dongs and Flight C winners were Adam and Chris.

Good luck to everyone in Whistler next week! But if you’re not there we’re looking forward to seeing you at our game!

Full results are available at https://mercerislandbridge.github.io/2025/251021E.htm

Common game results are available at https://thecommongame.com/NiteResults/20251021Rank.html
entry.summary: Thanks for coming to tonight’s game. Our winners tonight were Kim and Jeff. Winners the other direction were Cornel and Dave S. Flight b winners were the Dongs and Flight C winners were Adam and Chris.

entry.title: October 14, 2025 Results
entry.content:
Thanks for coming to tonight’s game. Our winners were Shawn and David with a fantastic 68% game. N/S winners were Tom and Joe.

Next week will be another Club Appreciation game for extra MPs!

Full results are available at https://mercerislandbridge.github.io/2025/251014E.htm

Common game results are available at https://thecommongame.com/NiteResults/20251014Rank.html
entry.summary: Thanks for coming to tonight’s game. Our winners were Shawn and David with a fantastic 68% game. N/S winners were Tom and Joe.

entry.title: October 07, 2025 Results
entry.content:
Thanks for coming to tonight’s game. Come play at the Monthly Unit Game at SBC on Sunday afternoon at 1:00! We will have another Club Appreciation Game in two weeks.

Winners tonight were Kim and Eric. Flight B winners were Sue and Becky. Flight C winners were Chris and Adam.

Full results are available at https://mercerislandbridge.github.io/2025/251007E.htm

Common game results are available at https://thecommongame.com/NiteResults/20251007Rank.html

entry.title: September 30, 2025 Results
entry.content:
Thanks for coming to tonight’s game. Best of luck to all our members going to Oregon to beat up those poor folks. See everyone back next Tuesday!

4 66.20 71.50 B 1 1 1.40(A) Jeffrey Ford - David Wright 7 57.87 62.50 A 2 0.98(A) Mike Ring - Mike Christensen 9 56.48 61.00 C 3 2 1 0.70(A) Ata Ivanov - Manski Fransazov

Full results are available at https://mercerislandbridge.github.io/2025/250930E.htm

Common game results are available at https://thecommongame.com/NiteResults/20250930Rank.html
entry.summary: Thanks for coming to tonight’s game. Best of luck to all our members going to Oregon to beat up those poor folks. See everyone back next Tuesday!

entry.title: September 23, 2025 Results
entry.content:
Thanks for coming to tonight’s game. Our winners in all three flights were Chris Morris-Lent and Muhunthan Sivapragasam with a huge 67% game.

Good luck to everyone playing in Seaside!

Full results are available at https://mercerislandbridge.github.io/2025/250923E.htm

Common game results are available at https://thecommongame.com/NiteResults/20250923Rank.html
